name: Revive & Prosper: Prologue
description:
Embark on an journey in Prologue of Revive & Prosper, the peaceful single-player voxel-based strategy game that will ignite your passion for base-building, automation, and land re-cultivation. Immerse yourself in a world teeming with possibilities, where building, producing, and harvesting blend harmoniously with a living ecosystem.

Features:

  • Unleash your creativity as you construct a thriving base amidst landscapes you have revived with the mighty power of water.


  • Unveil the secrets of the Golem factory, granting you the ability to create dedicated Golem helpers.


  • Teamwork makes the dream work!
